articles.title: Box Office: ‘Inside Out 2’ Passing ‘Dune: Part Two’ to Become Top Movie of 2024 in North America - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The Pixar feature is expected to achieve the feat on Friday, only its eighth day in release. Elsewhere, 'The Exorcism' looks to be among the worst wide openings of Russell Crowe's career.
articles.content:
Inside Out 2is showing no signs of slowing down as it heads into its second weekend.

articles.title: Who is Donald Trump's reclusive new mega-donor, Timothy Mellon? - BBC.com
articles.description: The scion of one of America's wealthiest families is so far the Trump 2024 campaign's largest donor.
articles.content:
By Bernd Debusmann Jr, BBC News, Washington 
Timothy Mellon has donated both to RFK Jr and Donald Trump in the 2024 electoral cycle.
